cmd:
import sys, os
path = sys.argv[1]
mode = int(sys.argv[2])
if not os.path.isdir(path):
  if os.path.exists(path):
    print "%s exists but is not a dir" % path
    sys.exit(1)
  os.makedirs(path, mode)
name: preprocess_for_goma.makedirs goma cache directory

import glob
import sys

  f.write('\n'.join(glob.glob(sys.argv[2])))
